naslov: Okrug Donji, obiteljska kuća uz more u zelenilu, super prilika, 220 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Izuzetno atraktivna samostojeća obiteljska kuća u Okrugu Donjem, odmah do mora s direktnim izlazom na plažu. Uzdiže se na tri etaže s ca. 220 kvadrata bruto stambenog prostora, čvrste i kvalitetne gradnje, opremljena i namještena. Na svakoj je etaži po jedan apartman za zasebnim ulazom, u prizemlju i na drugom katu jednosobni, dok je apartman na prvom katu dvosobni. Svaki apartman objedinjuje odvojenu prostranu terasu s prekrasnim pogledom na more. U svakom su apartmanu smješteni i kombinirani dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovaonica, te kupaonica. Do nekretnine se stiže pješice za nekih 200 m, dok su dva odvojena parkirna mjesta osigurana uz glavnu prometnicu. Postavljeni su klima uređaji u svakom apartmanu, PVC stolarija s dvoslojnim izo-staklima i griljama, bežični internet, satelitska televizija, a podovi su obloženi keramičkim pločicama. S vanjske se strane nalaze zidani roštilj, vanjski tuš i vrtne garniture, a tu su i izdvojeni podrum te prostrana cisterna. Rezidenciju sa svih strana krasi i vrtni prostor s postavljenim slavinama za navodnjavanje. Nekretnina je okružena prekrasnim zelenilom, nudi iznimno visoki stupanj intime, nesvakidašnji mir, te neposredan i privatni izlaz na more i plažu u kojima se može uživati bez ikakve buke i gužvi. Korištena je u turističke svrhe i uz ulaganje u osvježenje i unaprijeđenje prostora, kuća pruža fantastičan potencijal preobrazbe u jednu idiličnu vilu, doslovno stvorenu za odmor i relaksaciju, potpuno slobodnu od sveprisutnih sezonskih vreva, strka i galame. --- Extremely attractive detached family house in Okrug Donji, right by the sea and with direct access to the beach. It rises over three floors with approx. 220 square meters of gross living space, of solid and high-quality construction, equipped and furnished. Each floor comprises one apartment with a separate entrance, on the ground floor and on the second floor there is a single-bedroom apartment, while the apartment on the first floor entails a twin-bedroom apartment. Each apartment encompasses a separate spacious terrace with a beautiful view of the sea. Each apartment includes a combined living room, kitchen and dining room, and a bathroom. The property can be reached on foot after about 200 m, with two separate parking spaces provided along the main road. Air conditioning units are installed in each apartment, PVC carpentry with double-layer insulating glass and shutters, wireless Internet, satellite television, and ceramic tiles on the floors. On the outside lies a brick barbecue, outdoor shower and garden furniture set, and there is also a separate basement and a spacious cistern. The residence is adorned on all sides by a garden area with installed irrigation faucets. The property is surrounded by beautiful greenery, it offers an extremely high degree of intimacy, extraordinary tranquility, and direct and private access to the sea and the beach, which can be enjoyed without any noise or crowds. It was used for tourist purposes and with an investment in the renovation and upgrade of the spaces, the house offers a fantastic potential for transformation into an idyllic villa, literally created for rest and relaxation, completely free from the omnipresent seasonal hustle and bustle.
